data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Malamel, Jobi J., Sankaran, Pradeep M., Joseph, Mathew M., Sebastian, Pothalil A. (2015): First record of the wolf spider genus Lysania Thorell, 1890 from India with the description of a new species (Araneae: Lycosidae: Zoicinae). Zootaxa 3904 (2): 293-297, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.2.8
